guidanceItem.title: There is script source access only on folders that support content authoring.
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that script source access permissions are configured only for folders that allow content authoring.

How to Check

Web permissions are configured through the IIS snap-in and are maintained in the IIS metabase. They are not NTFS permissions.

Note   Folders that support content authoring should be configured to require authentication and SSL for encryption.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
